amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute extended coverage of the bill to the Casa Malpais National Historic Landmark in Arizona and to the provision for roads in the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hansen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
